description:
Player (Shooting Guard) in the Kouzu Basketball Club.
Akane Tachibana is an impulsive, hot-tempered boy. He`s spontaneous, transparent and he has no problem to say what he thinks.
He doesn`t hesitate to beat up anyone who says something wrong.
He`s arrogant and proud. but it`s just for this that he has a strong personality and appears the most original character of the story.
His real interest is not basketball itself, but the opportunity to challenge Hiiragi Hitonari, player of the same team. This purpose stimulate him more than anything else.
In fact, Tachibana and Hiiragi are united by a mysterious special bond of friendship, esteem and competition.
name: Tachibana Akane
